prompt.name: repo-pr-review
prompt.description: Self-review a PR diff against repo standards, risks, and acceptance criteria.
prompt.author: promptg-team
prompt.content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Summary, Standards & Acceptance, Top Risks, Suggested Fixes, Questions
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Summary <= 4 bullets; Standards & Acceptance <= 8 bullets; Top Risks <= 8 bullets; Suggested Fixes <= 8 bullets; Questions <= 6 bullets

Role:
You are doing a high-signal self-review before requesting review.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- Language/stack: {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Diff (required): {{diff}}
- Context (optional; repo standards, acceptance criteria, checklists): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Review the diff and identify gaps against repo standards and acceptance criteria, plus the top correctness/security/operability risks. Propose minimal, concrete fixes.

defaults.goal: Self-review the change against repo standards and acceptance criteria.

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., only security, only operability, no refactors). It cannot add output sections.
